definition: The Butterfly Lovers, Chinese folktale/abbr. for 梁山伯與祝英台|梁山伯与祝英台[Liang2 Shan1 bo2 yu3 Zhu4 Ying1 tai2]
Liang Dynasty (502-557)/Later Liang Dynasty (907-923)/surname Liang
roof beam/beam (structure)/bridge
surname Zhu
to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard

sentences.english: I was deeply touched to receive your wonderful letter and The Butterfly Lovers cd.
sentences.chinese: 收到你們美妙的信和《梁祝》的唱片，我深受感動。

sentences.english: The next station is LIANGZHU. Please get ready for your arrival.
sentences.chinese: 列車運行前方→梁祝站，下車的乘客請做好準備。

sentences.english: "Romance of the water" concept from the classic Chinese love story "The Butterfly Lovers.
sentences.chinese: “浪漫之水”的構思源於中國經典愛情故事《梁祝》。

sentences.english: The Butterfly Lovers or Liang Zhu is one of the four famousest Chinese legends.
sentences.chinese: 梁祝傳說是我國四大民間傳說之一。

sentences.english: A song covers with to dance in the wind of the beam wish, singing exhausted human life of exceedingly sentimental.
sentences.chinese: 一曲漫天飛舞的梁祝，唱盡人間的纏綿悱惻。
